item.title: Configuring WIFI via Command Line
item.description: The RaspberryPi Wireless WiFi Dongle Configuration guide by Farnell is THE BEST iâ€™ve found so far. To check if your wifi dongle is recognized ifconfig if you see wlan0, it confirms that raspberry pi has detected your wifi adaptor. To scan for wifi networks sudo iwlist wlan0 scan Edit the wpa_supplicant.conf file sudo nano /etc/wpa_supplicant/wpa_supplicant.conf Add the following with your network details at the end of the file, below update_config=1.
